successes.title: Lima,Â The Brain of Your Devices
successes.description: Lima reinvents the way your devices store data. Find the same files everywhere. Forget size limits. Keep your content private.

Pledges.description: VERY EARLY BIRD: You get a Plug device, in Blue color. And you get it at a very special price. This device won't be manufactured ever again after this campaign. It's a proof you're one of our earliest supporters. (Please add $10 for shipping)
EARLY BIRD: You get a Plug device, in Blue color. This device won't be manufactured ever again after this campaign. It's a proof you're one of our earliest supporters. (Please add $10 for shipping)
CLASSIC: You get one of the first Plug devices, in black. This device will retail for $150 after this Kickstarter campaign. (Please add $10 for shipping)

CLASSIC (extended): You get one of the first Plug devices, in black. This device will retail for $150 after this Kickstarter campaign. 
(shipping *included*)
CLASSIC (second batch): You get one of the first Plug devices, in black. This device will retail for $150 after this Kickstarter campaign. (shipping *included*)
CLASSIC (second batch): You get one of the first Lima devices, in black. This device will retail for $150 after this Kickstarter campaign. ($10 shipping included)
BACKUP PACK: You get 2 black Plug devices, to replicate your data in 2 different places. Please add $20 for shipping.
BACKUP PACK (extended): You get 2 black Plug devices, to replicate your data in 2 different places. (shipping *included*)
BACKUP PACK (second batch): You get 2 black Plug devices, to replicate your data in 2 different places. (shipping *included*)
BACKUP PACK (second batch): You get 2 black Lima devices, to replicate your data in 2 different places. ($10 shipping included)
ANGEL: You want to help us ROCK storage. You'll get our VIP Blue Plug device, plus a direct call from us so we can start knowing each other.
ANGEL: You want to help us ROCK storage. You'll get our VIP Blue Lima device, plus a direct call from us so we can start knowing each other.
PARTNER: 3 years of Cloud storage! (No. Just kidding. Let's talk.)
